speech:
Progressive muscle relaxation: This technique involves tensing and relaxing different muscle groups in your body, which can help to release tension and promote relaxation.

Spend time in nature
Talk to a trusted friend or family member

Get a new interesting hobby or meet someone you love talking to.

Consider professional help: If you're struggling to cope, a therapist or counselor can help.

Get enough sleep: Aim for 7-8 hours of sleep per night

Eat a healthy diet 

Exercise regularly

Limit alcohol and caffeine

Engage in hobbies and activities you enjoy
